Name: starmade
Overview: This container will download and install a StarMade Dedicated Server. It will also install a basic server.cfg at the first startup.

TCP - Game Port.Name: TCP - Game Port
TCP - Game Port.Description: TCP - Game Port (If you need another port delete this entry and create a new Port with the corresponding port numbers).

Extra Game Parameters.Name: Extra Game Parameters
Extra Game Parameters.Description: Enter your extra startup parameters otherwise leave blank!

XMS Size.Name: XMS Size
XMS Size.Description: Enter your XMS size in MB (XMS=The initial and minimum heap size. It is recommended to set the minimum heap size equivalent to the maximum heap size in order to minimize the garbage collection.)

XMX Size.Name: XMX Size
XMX Size.Description: Enter your XMX size in MB (XMX=The maximum heap size. The performance will decrease if the max heap value is set lower than the amount of live data. It will force frequent garbage collections in order to free up space.)

Runtime Name.Name: Runtime Name
Runtime Name.Description:
Enter your extracted Runtime folder name.
Don't change unless you are knowing what you are doing!

Starter Parameters.Name: Starter Parameters
Starter Parameters.Description: Only change if you know what you are doing!

Download URL.Name: Download URL
Download URL.Description: Only change if you know what you are doing!
